author: rgerosa
body:
Following the discussion with @perrotta in [PR39146](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39146#discussion_r957626958), this PR includes a couple of fixes for the PNET triggers monitor in DQM:

1) Check on some vector size to avoid access to a non existing position.
2) Fix minDR assignment.
3) Extend transformed PNET score x-axis in order to reduce events in the overflow bin.

Once approved: (1) back-port to 12-5-X will be open, (2) the PR mentioned above will be merged in 12-4-X
title: Fix for PNET DQM monitoring
